# Kick It Ca to Hubspot Project - Setup Instructions

## Workspace Setup Checklist

- [ ] **Clarify Project Requirements** - Determine project type and framework
- [ ] **Scaffold the Project** - Create initial project structure
- [ ] **Customize the Project** - Apply project-specific modifications
- [ ] **Install Required Extensions** - Install VS Code extensions
- [ ] **Compile the Project** - Build and validate the project
- [ ] **Create and Run Task** - Set up build/run tasks
- [ ] **Launch the Project** - Test the project execution
- [ ] **Ensure Documentation is Complete** - Finalize README and instructions

## Project Overview

**Project Name:** Kick It Ca to Hubspot Integration
**Description:** Integration system for syncing data between Kick It Ca and Hubspot CRM

Awaiting clarification on project requirements (language, framework, specific integration details).
